Package com.victorsanchez.exercise.persistence

Class QuestionController

java.lang.Object
com.victorsanchez.exercise.persistence.QuestionController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/questions")
public class QuestionController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller that serves different APIs to be consumed GET /questions - returns a list of questions stored POST /questions - creates a new question GET /questions/{id} - returns the requested question POST /questions/{id}/reply - creates a reply for the question id

  • Constructor Summary

    QuestionController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionDTO> createQuestion​(QuestionEntity question)
    Given a question, sends it to the service layer to store it.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReplyEntity> createReply​(java.lang.Long questionId, ReplyEntity reply)
    Given a question id and a reply object to be stored, sends it to the service layer to store it.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<QuestionDTO>> getAllQuestions()
    Returns the list of the questions stored
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionDTO> getQuestionById​(java.lang.Long id)

  • Method Details

    • getAllQuestions

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<QuestionDTO>> getAllQuestions()
      Returns the list of the questions stored
      Returns:
      List of QuestionDTO which can be empty

    • getQuestionById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionDTO> getQuestionById​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id) throws RecordNotFoundException
      Given a Question ID as param, returns the question if founded
      Parameters:
      id - of the question to be returned
      Returns:
      JSON info with the question information and 200 Status
      Throws:
      RecordNotFoundException - if the question is not found

    • createQuestion

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionDTO> createQuestion​(@RequestBody QuestionEntity question)
      Given a question, sends it to the service layer to store it.
      Parameters:
      question - Question Entity object to be stored
      Returns:
      QuestionDTO if is correctly stored and 201 Status

    • createReply

      @PostMapping("/{id}/reply") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReplyEntity> createReply​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long questionId, @RequestBody ReplyEntity reply) throws RecordNotFoundException
      Given a question id and a reply object to be stored, sends it to the service layer to store it.
      Parameters:
      questionId - - ID of the parent question
      reply - - ReplyEntity with the information to be stored
      Returns:
      ReplyEntity object stored and 201 Status
      Throws:
      RecordNotFoundException - is thrown when the question attached to the reply is not found
